desc: This course, being offered for the last time in Spring 2007, provides students with the background needed to teach elementary reading. Students learn about whole language and skills-based instruction and examine how to integrate the two in a balance reading program. Required 10-hour field experience. Prerequisites: Education 290 and 330, or permission of instructor.
name: Teaching Reading K-6
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Education 290 and 330, or permission of instructor.
title: Teaching of Reading K-6
